member.name: T:SecurePasswordGenerator.RandomPassword
member.summary: Class for generating secure random passwords

member.name: M:SecurePasswordGenerator.RandomPassword.Generate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate password with default options, specifying a password length
member.param: System.Int32 value indicating how long the generated password should be

member.name: M:SecurePasswordGenerator.RandomPassword.Generate(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate password specifying the minimum and maximum length
member.param: Integer value for the minimum length to generate
Integer value for the maximum length to generate

member.name: M:SecurePasswordGenerator.RandomPassword.Generate(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.param: Integer value for the minimum length to generate
Integer value for the maximum length to generate
Whether or not to include special characters (symbols)
